first_translate: zee.
as you know already, father has collapsed.

hangle: 의원은 아버지가 의식을 차릴 가능성이 거의 없으니,
first_translate: the physician said that he won’t regain consciousness anytime soon,
and told us to prepare for his passing.
but here’s the thing--

hangle: 이게 아버지가 정식 유언장을 작성하기도 전에 일어난 일이란 거지.
first_translate: this happened before father could write up his official will.
that being so,
it is only right that I, the eldest son and heir of house green,

hangle: 상속에 관한 문제를 정하는 게 당연하다!
first_translate: make all decisions regarding matters of inheritance!
caindel, firstborn son of count green
k-kaine...
I don’t think so.

hangle: 요즘 세상에 첫째만 가문을 이어받으란 법이 있습니까?
first_translate: in this day and age, there's no rule saying that the eldest child must inherit everything.
zen, second-born son of count green
house green is a family of mages.

hangle: 마법 실력이 더 나은 쪽이 가문을 이어받는 게 당연하죠.
first_translate: of course, whoever possesses greater magical prowess shall take over the household.
hmph...!

hangle: 지금 네가 나보다 마법 실력이 낫다고 말하는 거냐?!
first_translate: do you dare say your skills are better than mine?! how preposterous!
isn’t it obvious?
all you’re capable of doing is conjuring fire...

hangle: 겨우 모닥불 크기의 불을 만드는 수준이잖습니까.
first_translate: ...the size of a campfire at best.

hangle: 네까짓 게 감히 형님 어려운 줄 모르고 대들어?!
first_translate: how dare you talk back like that without any respect toward me?!
get out of our home immediately!

hangle: 제가 이 집을 나갈 이유가 뭐 있겠습니까?
first_translate: why would I do such a thing?

hangle: 나가야 할 쪽은 마법사 가문에 먹칠하는 형님이죠.
first_translate: if anyone needs to leave, it’s you since you bring shame upon our name by calling yourself a mage.
you little brat...!
fighting amongst yourselves like this...

hangle: 혹여 소문이라도 퍼져 남들이 떠들까 부끄럽구나.
first_translate: I’m ashamed people might hear about this and gossip behind our backs.
countess green
mother!

hangle: 젠 녀석이 제게 하는 행동을 보고 말씀하시죠.
first_translate: did you see what zee did just now?

hangle: 무능한 형님이 가문을 말아먹는 걸 보는 것보다는 낫죠.
first_translate: watching him ruin our family because of his incompetence is far worse.
excuse me?!
enough!!!

hangle: 경박하게 싸우는 꼴을 더 이상 눈뜨고 볼 수가 없구나.
first_translate: I cannot bear watching you two fight like children anymore.
I’ll handle the matter of succession myself.

hangle: 너희들은 이 이상 재산에 대해 왈가왈부하지 말렴.
first_translate: from now on, neither one of you may speak another word about the estate.
wait.
not even you have the authority to make such demands.
pardon?
we’ve noticed something recently.
about mother having a lover.

hangle: 어머니가 그 애송이에게 많은 돈을 주고 있다는 것도 압니다.
first_translate: we also know she gives large sums of money to her young boy toy.

hangle: 전 그놈에게 가문의 재산이 넘어갈까 걱정되네요.
first_translate: to be honest, we worry that he'll end up inheriting our wealth instead.

hangle: 너희를 낳아 준 이 어미에게 그 말버릇은 대체 뭐니!
first_translate: what kind of way is that to speak to your own mother?!
no need to get angry.

hangle: 어머니가 어떤 놈과 만나든 저희는 신경 쓰지 않으니까요.
first_translate: whoever you choose to meet doesn’t concern us.
however...

hangle: 그런 소문이 사교계에 퍼졌다간 고상하신 어머니는 상처받으시겠죠?
first_translate: should rumors spread throughout high society, wouldn’t they hurt someone as noble as you?
you insolent brats...!!
my lady, young masters...
what is going on here?!
y-you see...

hangle: 손님이 오셨는데 아무래도 확인하셔야 될 것 같습니다.
first_translate: a guest arrived earlier, but I believe you should go check personally.
a guest?!
just who exactly?
uh...
lady fiona green,
who left five years ago for hailon, has returned.
impossible!
she survived?
it must be some imposter.

hangle: 열세 살짜리가 북부의 전투에서 아직까지 살아 있는 게 말이 돼?
first_translate: there’s no way a thirteen-year-old girl made it through those battles alive.

hangle: 게다가 걘 변변찮은 마법도 부릴 줄 모르는 걸로 알고 있는데-
first_translate: on top of that, she didn’t even possess decent magical abilities--

hangle: 우리 모두는 피오나 그린에 대해 알고 있다.
first_translate: everyone knows about fiona green.
count green brought her into our home,

hangle: 쓸모가 없어 다락방에 가둬 놓았던 사생아―
first_translate: but locked away in the attic after realizing she was useless--
then together, everyone pushed her off to war...

hangle: 가족들이 합심해서 사지로 밀어 넣은 어린아이.
first_translate: ...in order to maintain appearances under royal command.

hangle: 뭐, 그 일에 대해서는 다들 아무 죄책감도 가지지 않지만.
first_translate: anyway, none of us feel guilty about sending her off.
go chase them away.
obviously, it’s not really--
that’s quite enough.
l-lady fiona!
please wait until her grace grants permission to enter!
for once,
tell me it isn’t true...
I finally came back...
after finishing my long journey.
fiona green, second daughter of count green

hangle: 보내주신 사망 확인용 편지는 잘 받았어요.
first_translate: I received the letter confirming my death.
but...

hangle: 사망 확인서보다는 직접 얼굴을 보이는 걸 더 싫어-
first_translate: rather than reading confirmation of my demise,
I thought seeing each other face-to-face would be more enjoyable.
now that their cute youngest sister has come back after so many years,
I'm sure you'd welcome me warmly, yes?

hangle: 전 제 가족들이 변하지 않은 것 같아서 기쁘거든요.
first_translate: I am truly glad to find that nothing has changed within my family.
truly.
oh...
something feels strange though...
now that I look around,
this place is actually the manor of house green rather than hailon castle...

hangle: 다행히 괜찮은 방을 줘서 잘 잤어.
first_translate: at least they gave me a nice room last night.
I almost flipped when I saw it wasn’t the old attic again.
I enjoyed seeing their dumbfounded faces yesterday too.
I enjoyed seeing their dumbfounded faces yesterday too.
judging from their behavior,

hangle: 보아하니 상속 문제 때문에 분열하면서 싸울 것 같던데….
first_translate: it seems they've been fighting among themselves due to issues concerning the inheritance...
I’d prefer not getting involved.

hangle: 상속 포기 각서에 사인을 하고 오늘내일 안에 떠나는 게 좋겠다.
first_translate: I guess signing papers renouncing my claim to the inheritance then leaving today or tomorrow sounds good.
lady fiona.
I brought water for washing up.
come in.
thank you...
be careful next time.
when you set down the basin, water splashed everywhere.

hangle: 헤일론의 하녀들은 이런 실수를 하지 않는데.
first_translate: the maids of hailon never made mistakes like these.
huh...?
why is this washbasin so dirty?
I smell something foul coming from the water too.
this...
they used dishwater!
